title: Charlotte's web (Captioned)
creator_credit: Hanna-Barbera Productions, Sagittarius Productions, Joseph Barbera, William Hanna, Charles Nichols and Iwao Takamoto
brief_description: Lovable farmyard characters from E. B. White’s novel cavort, sing and explore their world. Wilbur the pig is afraid he’ll end up on the dinner table, until he is befriended by Charlotte the spider and saved by her magic web. Voices include Debbie Reynolds, Henry Gibson and Agnes Moorehead.
